jhelp.util.gui

Class JHelpRichText

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.util.gui.JHelpRichText

  • public final class JHelpRichText
extends java.lang.Object
    Text with the possibility to insert some image in it.
    For example it can replace every :) by a picture like
    Author:
    JHelp

    • Method Detail

      • createImage

        private JHelpImage createImage(java.lang.String text,
                     JHelpFont font,
                     int colorText,
                     JHelpPaint paintText,
                     JHelpImage textureText)
        Compute image that draw the text with symbols replaced by corresponding images
        Parameters:
        text - Text to draw
        font - Font to use for text
        colorText - Color for text (Used if paintText and texturePaint are null)
        paintText - Paint for text (Used if not null and texturePaint is null)
        textureText - Texture for text (Used if not null)
        Returns:
        Created image

      • obtainImage

        private JHelpImage obtainImage(java.lang.String resource,
                     int size)
        Obtain an image from cache
        Parameters:
        resource - Image resource name
        size - Image size
        Returns:
        The image
